attributes.action: Help college students into work and not pass them off to the New Deal scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More help is needed for the jobless college students that have spent 2 or 3 yrs learning a trade then have to be palmed off to the New Deal scheme run by jobcentre plus.These adults are now being told they have to take other routes in careers eg bar work,cleaning when they have spent their time learning a skill that this country needs,why has this skill been ignored when we are crying out for it.
